scripts.db:start: docker compose -p boba-db -f .docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker compose -p boba-db -f .docker/docker-compose.yml up
scripts.deploy: yarn run build && gcloud config set project bobaboard && gcloud app deploy --version live
scripts.dev: yarn run db:start & yarn run server:dev
scripts.dev:watch: node -e "console.error('This command has been deprecated. Use server:dev now.')"
scripts.open-api:typescript: yarn run open-api:generate && yarn run open-api:typescript:types && yarn run open-api:typescript:schemas
scripts.open-api:validate: yarn run open-api:generate && validate-api open-api/open-api-spec.json && openapi-examples-validator open-api/open-api-spec.json --ignore-formats color quill-delta && openapi lint open-api/open-api-spec.json --skip-rule=no-ambiguous-paths
scripts.server:build: rm -rf ./dist && tsc && tsc-alias && copyfiles .env.prod firebase-sdk.json server/**/*.sql ./dist
scripts.server:dev: cross-env DEBUG=bobaserver:*,-*info DEBUG_DEPTH=10 nodemon --watch . --exec node -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register server/index.ts -e yaml,ts,sql
scripts.server:start: cross-env DEBUG=bobaserver:*,-*info node -r dotenv/config dist/server/index.js dotenv_config_path=./.env.prod
scripts.start-db: node -e "console.error('This command has been deprecated. Use db:start now.')"
scripts.test:docker: docker compose -f .docker/docker-compose.test.yml down && docker compose -p boba-server-test -f .docker/docker-compose.test.yml run --rm test
